const response = await client.search({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  scroll: "1m",
  slice: {
    id: 0,
    max: 2,
  },
  query: {
    match: {
      message: "foo",
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.search({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  scroll: "1m",
  slice: {
    id: 1,
    max: 2,
  },
  query: {
    match: {
      message: "foo",
    },
  },
});
console.log(response1);
